entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
